sobreMim.textoSobre: I'm a Front-End developer with experience in JavaScript and TypeScript, creating fast and straightforward interfaces. I work with React and focus on clarity, performance, and clean code. I enjoy solving problems in a simple and practical way, always striving for improvement. I'm open to opportunities to work on real projects and deliver real results.

contato.texto: Want to talk to me? Call me through any of the channels below.
